global-fap.description: "Lily" - Giclée printed on heavy-duty 308gsm matte paper made of 100% cotton rag with a natural white tone and excellent black saturation. It has a soft texture with a lightly defined felt structure, producing very high-quality print reproductions. An archival quality print of a realist acrylic painting of a woman.

global-cfp.description: "Lily" - Giclée printed on heavy-duty 308gsm matte paper made of 100% cotton rag with a natural white tone and excellent black saturation. It has a soft texture with a lightly defined felt structure, producing very high-quality print reproductions. An archival quality print of a realist acrylic painting of a woman.

global-fap.description: "Toronto Downtown Reflection" - Giclée printed on premium quality 200gsm heavyweight fine art print stock with a smooth, clean finish. This museum-quality paper is extremely consistent and works perfectly with large, full colour artworks, the matte finish emphasising different highlights and tones. An archival quality print of a realist acrylic painting of downtown Toronto, reflected in glass building.

global-cfp.description: "Toronto Downtown Reflection" - Giclée printed on premium quality 200gsm heavyweight fine art print stock with a smooth, clean finish. global-fap.description: "Mid Century Modern" - Giclée printed on premium quality 200gsm heavyweight fine art print stock with a smooth, clean finish. This museum-quality paper is extremely consistent and works perfectly with large, full colour artworks, the matte finish emphasising different highlights and tones. An archival quality print of a realist acrylic painting of Palm Springs, California, famous for its mid-centruy modern architecture.
